alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Linn; Miami (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 4:54PM CDT until May 09 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Miami County in east central Kansas... Linn County in east central Kansas... Johnson County in east central Kansas... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 454 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lone Star to near Centropolis to near Richmond to near Westphalia to near Le Roy, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Overland Park, Olathe, Lenexa, Gardner, De Soto, Paola, Spring Hill, Osawatomie, Louisburg, Edgerton, Pleasanton, La Cygne, Mound City, Linn Valley, Parker, Blue Mound, Prescott, Fontana, Clare and New Lancaster. This includes Interstate 35 in Kansas between mile markers 200 and 220. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
